FuncDef:
The arp direct-route tag command configures a tag for ARP Vlink direct routes.
The undo arp direct-route tag command restores the default configuration. The arp direct-route tag command configures a tag for ARP Vlink direct routes. The undo arp direct-route tag command restores the default configuration. By default, the tag of ARP Vlink direct routes is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a tag for ARP Vlink direct routes.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: By default, the tag of ARP Vlink direct routes is 0. To change the tag of ARP Vlink direct routes, run the arp direct-route tag command.
